txt.en: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a green-skinned Orc wearing a leather helm, leather tunic, and heavy armour on the shoulders, arms, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.

A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a green-skinned Orc wearing a leather helm, leather tunic, and heavy armour on the shoulders, arms, and lower legs. A sword in scabbard is worn on the back.
